id.description: The unique identifier for the promotion code.

code.description: The unique code string associated with the promotion code.

coupon.description: Information about the coupon associated with the promotion code.

id.description: The unique identifier for the coupon.

amount_off.description: The amount which will be discounted from the total if the coupon is applied.

currency.description: The currency in which the discount amount is specified.

duration.description: Indicates how long the discount will last (e.g, once, forever).

duration_in_months.description: Optional. The number of months the coupon will last.

metadata.description: Additional information attached to the coupon.

percent_off.description: The percentage to be discounted if the coupon is applied.

applies_to.description: Specifies any products to which the coupon can be applied.

items.description: Specify the list of product IDs to which the coupon applies.

created.description: The date and time when the coupon was created.

livemode.description: Indicates if the coupon is in live mode or test mode.

max_redemptions.description: The maximum number of times the coupon can be redeemed.

redeem_by.description: The last date and time when the coupon can be redeemed.

times_redeemed.description: The number of times the coupon has been redeemed.

valid.description: Indicates if the coupon is currently valid for use.

metadata.description: Additional information attached to the promotion code.

active.description: Indicates if the promotion code is currently active.

created.description: The date and time when the promotion code was created.

updated.description: The date and time when the promotion code was last updated.

customer.description: The customer associated with the promotion code, if applicable.

expires_at.description: The date and time when the promotion code expires.

livemode.description: Indicates if the promotion code is in live mode or test mode.

max_redemptions.description: The maximum number of times the promotion code can be redeemed.

restrictions.description: Any restrictions associated with the promotion code application.

first_time_transaction.description: Indicates if the promotion code is applicable only for the first transaction.

minimum_amount.description: The minimum amount required for the promotion code to be valid.

minimum_amount_currency.description: The currency in which the minimum amount is specified.

times_redeemed.description: The number of times the promotion code has been redeemed.
